name: Hotel Trekkers Inn

reviews.text: The manager was very helpful. We appreciated him.
reviews.title: Had a pleasant time

reviews.text: He had arranged our sightseeing as we wanted. We've enjoyed from 5:30 am to 3:00 pm with only $60 by private car and driver. Though we were with 80 year old grandmother, we could visit almost all of the famous places.
reviews.title: Top place to stay

reviews.text: I suppose that Hotel Trekkers Inn is the best in Pokhara. We will be sure to stay here again.
reviews.title: Smiles and service

reviews.text: Local restaurant Thakali Kitchen which is next door, was tasty and convenient.
reviews.title: Clean Rooms, Excellent Service with Friendly, helpful staff

reviews.text: Thank you Trekkers hotel for an amazing stay. Whilst my husband, daughter, and her partner went trekking for a few days, I stayed by myself in this hotel. at all times The staff and owner were most kind and obliging. I would like to thank them all for being so kind.Their customer service cannot be faulted in any way. The room I stayed in was lovely, clean and light and with plenty of room, with amazing views of the mountains. I would like to thank Sadarshum the waiter, who on his couple of hours break offered to take me sightseeing what a lovely young man. Look no further than this hotel I am sure you will not be disappointed the rates were very reasonable and breakfast was in the price. I wish all of you the best thank you.
reviews.title: Really great stay- perfect end to a trek

reviews.text: Just back from Nepal. I stayed in Pokhara for 3 nights (9-11 Feb 2013) in this hotel and I had a pleasure stay with a good view here.
reviews.title: a pleasure stay with a good view

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My room is 502, which is bright, modern, clean and comfortable. The room has big windows. I can see Annapurna range and the sunrise on the bed. Even furnitures are a little bit broken, everything is alright. Hot water is always available whole day. Back-up electricity is also available, so you still have a light in the room for reading and a light in washroom.
reviews.title: Great value for money

reviews.text: The hotel's roof also can see a Fewa Lake as well. Of course, the starry night is also beautiful here.
reviews.title: Quiet and serene place to return to after a day of activities.

reviews.text: The location is good. You can reach the lake, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes.
reviews.title: Super friendly hotel.

reviews.text: This hotel can arrange some sight visiting, paragliding and other activities, you can check with them.
reviews.title: One of the best in Pokhara

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in this hotel in November 2011.
reviews.title: Best hotel in Nepal

reviews.text: The location of the hotel is great because it is very close to the lake plus it’s not directly on the main street.
reviews.title: great hotel just down from the main strip

reviews.text: They picked us up from the bus station. Our room at the hotel was big, with a tv, nice bed, large windows, private bathroom with shower, small desk and closet. It was very CLEAN. The staff were great and attentive and helped us to book one day trek and also private car and driver to go back to Kathmandu since we did not want to take bus again. The manager is so nice.
reviews.title: A Good Hotel In Pokhara

reviews.text: This was the best hotel during our 4 weeks in Nepal. Would love to go back to the Trekkers Inn.
reviews.title: Loved it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: extra friendly staff and good clean rooms. I stayed there for 2 nights before and 2 nights after the trek and was most pleased. Towels and sheets were clean. Beds were decent compared to most in nepal. The staff we re just so nice and helpful. They can book all kinds of tours and local activities.
reviews.title: The Staff, Location, Views in Pokhara

reviews.text: We went to on family vacation to pokhara we chosen hotel Trekkers inn for stay at pokhara, the Hotel memorable in pokhara specially thanks for mr Navaraj Thapaliya
reviews.title: Excellent hotel in pokhara.

reviews.text: Hotel staff was friendly and efficient especially at the reception and on the door. We had very nice check in at reception, and room was excellent and rooms offered to had a following features.
reviews.title: Average

reviews.text: 1. It was quite spacious and nice furnished
reviews.title: Five Star Experience from my new family in Nepal

reviews.text: 2. It was good sofa and TV
reviews.title: Breathtaking views and excellent service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Attached Bathroom
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

description: Trekkers Inn- Supplying the highest standards in Accommodation, Service & Hygiene.Following five years of detailed design and planning Trekkers Inn opened to guests in September 2010.Using over twenty years experience in owning and operating hotels we have tried to create a unique experience for our guests.All our rooms have the highest levels of comfort and quality and are designed to create a feeling of space with fresh clean lines and big windows to enjoy the views.Take some time to experience the sub-tropical climate and spectacular views in surroundings that will leave you feeling refreshed and relaxed after your stay.
